snippet: California Chrome returned to racing after a nine-month layoff, winning the $200,000 San Pasqual Stakes, for older horses, by one and a quarter lengths in Arcadia, Calif.
abstract: California Chrome wins $200,000 San Pasqual Stakes in Arcadia, Calif, five-year-old's first race after nine-month layoff.
lead_paragraph: California Chrome returned to racing after a nine-month layoff, winning the $200,000 San Pasqual Stakes, for older horses, by one and a quarter lengths in Arcadia, Calif.
